org.jhove2.core
Class Message

java.lang.Object
  org.jhove2.core.Message

@Persistent
public class Message
extends Object

JHOVE2 message. A message has a severity, a context, and a text code. Messages are localized. TODO: Document how messages are used.

Author:
slabrams, smorrissey
